Abnepos.text: Met with an accident, cannot keep appointment

Abneptis.text: Met with an accident, come as quickly as you can

Abnodo.text: Met with an accident, must postpone visit

Abnormis.text: Met with an accident, must remain here, letter by post

Abolesco.text: Met with an accident, not very serious

Abolevi.text: Met with an accident, only slight

Abolitio.text: Met with an accident, very serious

Abominor.text: Met with an accident, which prevents my leaving

Aborior.text: Met with an accident, will return

Abrasi.text: Met with an accident, boat upset, all safe

Abreptus.text: Met with an accident, boat upset, remain here till you come

Abrogo.text: Met with an accident, boat upset, send a change here

Abrumpo.text: Met with an accident, carriage upset, not hurt

Abruptio.text: Met with an accident, carriage upset, slightly hurt

Abscedo.text: Met with an accident, collision, not hurt

Abscindo.text: Met with an accident, collision, seriously hurt

Abscisse.text: Met with an accident, collision, slightly hurt

Absentia.text: Met with an accident, but need not come

Absilio.text: What is the nature of the accident
